snippet.title: Vengeful Rites - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Vengeful Rites is exiting early access on July 29th! 

Check out the game: https://store.steampowered.com/app/755410/Vengeful_Rites/

Embark on an epic adventure designed exclusively for VR! Use your own hands to cast magic, fire bows and slice through your enemies on your quest to exact vengeance against the evil Dragore. Learn new spells and craft new gear to become the greatest Serafin Warrior of all time!

We also proudly offer a free demo on Steam for you to try to before you buy. If you wish to continue your adventure, your save file carries right into the full game! There's nothing to lose, and adventure awaits!
